attributes.action: Not to restrict people's freedoms if they refuse a Covid test or vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: That the government be prevented from imposing restrictions for travel, work or events on any member of the public if they refuses a Covid test or vaccine as it will be an infringement of the publics freedom of choice.
attributes.background: That government be prevented from applying freedom passes on the public for refusing a Covid test or vaccine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not implement Covid-19 Freedom Passes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561818

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
